About.title: About Next X Level
About.description: Discover the story behind Next X Level - premium Canadian apparel that elevates your style
About.heroImageAlt: Next X Level brand story and heritage
About.heroTitle: The Story Behind Next X Level
About.heroSubtitle: From Canadian craftsmanship to global luxury - discover how we're redefining premium apparel.
About.mainHeadline: At Next X Level, we believe versatile style should never compromise on quality.
About.introParagraph1: Welcome to Next X Level, where premium Canadian apparel meets uncompromising versatility. Our mission is to deliver garments that seamlessly transition from mountain chalet to cocktail hour, golf course to downtown streets.
About.introParagraph2: Every piece in our collection is crafted with care, blending luxury materials used by top fashion houses with modern performance features to offer you the perfect balance between elevated style and everyday functionality.
About.brandImageAlt: Living room with black armchair and dark gray sofa
About.elevateHeadline: We are here to elevate your wardrobe with garments that reflect your authentic, confident style.
About.qualityParagraph1: At the heart of our brand is a deep commitment to quality. We understand that clothing isn't just fabric and thread; it's your confidence, your comfort, and your expression. That's why we source textiles used by luxury labels like Hugo Boss and Louis Vuitton, ensuring every garment we create meets the highest standards.
About.qualityParagraph2: From Japanese cotton blends and brushed French terry to technical performance knits, each fabric is carefully selected for its durability, comfort, and refined appearance. Our attention to detail extends to every stitch, seam, and finish, guaranteeing garments that not only look exceptional but perform beautifully over time.
About.designImageAlt: Gray one-seater sofa and wooden coffee table
About.designParagraph: Our design philosophy revolves around creating garments that are both stylish and versatile. Inspired by clean minimalism, modern performance, and timeless elegance, our collections are curated to suit diverse lifestyles and occasions. We understand that life doesn't fit into categories, so we offer pieces that transition effortlessly from active pursuits to social settings. Whether you're heading to the tennis court or a rooftop cocktail bar, we have something to elevate your look.
About.sustainabilityParagraph: We believe that premium fashion should be environmentally conscious, which is why we partner with Canadian manufacturers and strive to minimize our environmental footprint through responsible sourcing and transparent supply chains. Our commitment to sustainability ensures that our garments are not only beautifully crafted but also produced with respect for our planet.
About.customerHeadline: Our customers are at the center of everything we do!
About.customerParagraph1: Our team is here to help you discover pieces that perfectly fit your lifestyle, offering personalized support to ensure you find garments that truly elevate your confidence.
About.customerParagraph2: We're not just creating clothing - we're empowering you to live your best life in garments that keep up with your ambitions. Thank you for choosing Next X Level to be part of your style journey!

Contact.title: Contact Next X Level
Contact.description: Get in touch with Next X Level - premium Canadian apparel for your elevated lifestyle
Contact.heroImageAlt: Contact Next X Level customer service team
Contact.heroSubtitle: Your style journey starts with a conversation. Reach out and let our team help you discover your next level.
Contact.mainHeadline: Get in touch with Next X Level
Contact.introParagraph1: Ready to elevate your style? We're here to help you discover the perfect pieces for your lifestyle. Whether you have questions about our premium Canadian apparel, sizing, or need styling advice, our team is ready to assist.
Contact.introParagraph2: Connect with us through any of the channels below, and let's take your wardrobe to the next level together.
Contact.headquartersDescription: Our Canadian headquarters is where the magic happens - from design conception to quality control, every garment is crafted with the attention to detail that defines the Next X Level experience.
Contact.formSubjectPlaceholder: What can we help you with?
Contact.formMessagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
Contact.formSuccessMessage: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
Contact.brandPromiseDescription: Join the Next X Level community and discover premium Canadian apparel that seamlessly transitions from chalet to cocktail hour, golf course to downtown streets.

Store.title: Shop Next X Level
Store.description: Explore our complete collection of premium Canadian apparel - from versatile basics to statement pieces
Store.heroImageAlt: Next X Level premium apparel collection showcase
Store.heroTitle: Elevate Your Style. Elevate Your Life.
Store.heroSubtitle: Discover premium Canadian apparel—crafted for confidence, comfort, and every moment. Welcome to Next X Level.
Store.collectionDescription: Explore versatile, modern essentials designed to move with you—from the golf course to the city. Next X Level is where Canadian quality meets everyday style.
Store.comingSoonMessage: We're crafting exceptional premium Canadian apparel just for you. Our curated collection will be available soon.
Store.underConstructionMessage: We're putting the finishing touches on your elevated shopping experience.
Store.whyChooseQualityDesc: Every piece is crafted in Canada using luxury materials and meticulous attention to detail—so you can feel confident, comfortable, and elevated every day.
Store.whyChooseDesignDesc: From the golf course to the city, our modern silhouettes and refined finishes adapt to every moment of your lifestyle.
Store.whyChooseServiceDesc: Enjoy expert support, easy exchanges, and fast delivery—because your experience should be as elevated as your look.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: Learn how Next X Level protects your privacy and personal information
PrivacyPolicy.pageTitle: Privacy Policy for Next X Level
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Next X Level, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you interact with our website, services, and premium Canadian apparel. By using our platform, you consent to the practices described in this policy.
PrivacyPolicy.section1Content: We may collect personal information you provide directly to us, such as:
PrivacyPolicy.section1List1: Name, email address, and contact details when you sign up for an account.
PrivacyPolicy.section1List2: Billing and shipping addresses when you purchase our premium apparel.
PrivacyPolicy.section1List3: Payment information (credit/debit card details) for completing transactions securely.
PrivacyPolicy.section1List4: Personal preferences and style interests you share with us.
PrivacyPolicy.section1Additional: Additionally, we may automatically collect certain information when you access or use our website, including:
PrivacyPolicy.section1Auto1: IP address, browser type, operating system, and device information.
PrivacyPolicy.section1Auto2: Usage data, such as pages visited, time spent on our platform, and referring website.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Content: We may use your personal information for various purposes, including but not limited to:
PrivacyPolicy.section2List1: Providing and managing your account, purchases, and orders.
PrivacyPolicy.section2List2: Customizing your shopping experience and suggesting relevant premium apparel.
PrivacyPolicy.section2List3: Sending you updates, newsletters, and marketing communications (you can opt-out anytime).
PrivacyPolicy.section2List4: Analyzing user behavior to improve our website and services.
PrivacyPolicy.section2List5: Complying with legal obligations and enforcing our Terms of Service.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Content: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your browsing activity on our website. These technologies help us analyze usage patterns and enhance user experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Content: We may share your personal information with third parties under certain circumstances, including:
PrivacyPolicy.section4List1: Service providers who assist us in operating our business and delivering premium apparel.
PrivacyPolicy.section4List2: Legal authorities or government agencies as required by law.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Note: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes.
PrivacyPolicy.section5Content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure.
PrivacyPolicy.section6List1: Review and update your personal information in your account settings.
PrivacyPolicy.section6List3: Delete your account (subject to applicable laws and regulations).
PrivacyPolicy.section7Content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 16. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from children without parental consent, we will take prompt action to delete such data.
PrivacyPolicy.section8Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes via email or by prominently posting a notice on our website.
PrivacyPolicy.section9Content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at:
PrivacyPolicy.contactAddress: Address: 123 Queen Street West, Suite 800, Toronto, ON M5H 2M9, Canada

CookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
CookiePolicy.description: Learn how Next X Level uses cookies to enhance your shopping experience
CookiePolicy.pageTitle: Cookie Policy for Next X Level
CookiePolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Next X Level uses cookies and similar technologies on our website. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
CookiePolicy.section1Content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide a better browsing experience. Cookies also enable website owners to collect certain information about visitors.
CookiePolicy.section2Content: We use the following types of cookies on our website:
CookiePolicy.section2Essential: Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the operation of our website and enable you to navigate and use its features. They are typically set in response to your actions, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling out forms.
CookiePolicy.section2Analytics: Analytics and Performance Cookies: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting information such as the number of visitors, pages visited, and sources of traffic. This data helps us improve our website's performance and usability.
CookiePolicy.section2Functionality: Functionality Cookies: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make (such as language preferences) and provide enhanced features. They may also be used to provide personalized content based on your browsing history.
CookiePolicy.section2Advertising: Advertising and Targeting Cookies: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
CookiePolicy.section3Content: We may allow third-party service providers, such as analytics and advertising companies, to place cookies on our website. These third parties may collect information about your online activities over time and across different websites.
CookiePolicy.section4Content: You can manage and control cookies through your browser settings. Most web browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. However, please note that blocking or deleting certain cookies may impact the functionality and user experience of our website.
CookiePolicy.section4Additional: For more information on how to manage cookies, you can visit the help or settings section of your browser.
CookiePolicy.section5Content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our use of cookies or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a prominent notice on our website.
CookiePolicy.section6Content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Cookie Policy, please contact us at:
CookiePolicy.contactAddress: Address: 123 Queen Street West, Suite 800, Toronto, ON M5H 2M9, Canada

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.description: Learn about Next X Level's terms of use and service conditions
TermsOfUse.pageTitle: Terms of Use for Next X Level
TermsOfUse.intro: Welcome to Next X Level. These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our website, products, and premium Canadian apparel services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website.
TermsOfUse.section1Content: All content and materials on our website, including text, graphics, logos, images, videos, and trademarks, are the property of Next X Level or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, modify, or distribute any of our content without our prior written permission.
TermsOfUse.section2Eligibility: Eligibility: You must be at least 16 years old to use our website. If you are under the age of 18, you should review these terms with a parent or guardian to ensure their understanding and agreement.
TermsOfUse.section2Account: User Account: Some features of our website may require you to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and are solely responsible for any activity that occurs under your account.
TermsOfUse.section2Prohibited: Prohibited Activities: You agree not to engage in any of the following activities:
TermsOfUse.section2ProhibitedList1: Violating any applicable laws or regulations.
TermsOfUse.section2ProhibitedList2: Impersonating any person or entity or falsely representing your affiliation with any person or entity.
TermsOfUse.section2ProhibitedList3: Interfering with or disrupting the functionality of our website or servers.
TermsOfUse.section2ProhibitedList4: Uploading or transmitting any viruses, malware, or other malicious code.
TermsOfUse.section2ProhibitedList5: Collecting or harvesting any information from our website without our consent.
TermsOfUse.section3Content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or display content from third parties. We do not endorse or control these third-party websites or content, and your use of them is at your own risk. We are not responsible for the accuracy, reliability, or legality of any third-party websites or content.
TermsOfUse.section4Content: Our website is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We do not make any warranties, express or implied, regarding the operation, availability, or accuracy of our website or the content therein. Your use of our website is at your sole risk.
TermsOfUse.section5Content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Next X Level and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our website, even if advised of the possibility of such damages.
TermsOfUse.section6Content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Next X Level and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including reasonable attorney's fees, arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or violation of these Terms of Use.
TermsOfUse.section7Content: We may modify or update these Terms of Use from time to time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our website following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.
TermsOfUse.section8Content: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Canada and the Province of Ontario. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Ontario, Canada.
TermsOfUse.section9Content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at:
TermsOfUse.contactAddress: Address: 123 Queen Street West, Suite 800, Toronto, ON M5H 2M9, Canada
